problems.problems_header: Your SIEM is Broken. You Know It.
problems.problems_disc: Legacy SIEMs generate thousands of alerts. Your analysts triage hundreds. Real threats slip through. Most security teams ignore 70% of their alerts because they don't have the resources to investigate them all.

how.how_subtitle: From Log to Resolution in Milliseconds

step1.title: Unified Ingestion
step1.description: Connect your entire stack in minutes. Cloud, on-prem, SaaS, endpoints—Vinci Logic normalizes and enriches data from 100+ integrations automatically.

step2.title: Behavioral Detection
step2.description: Rules catch known threats. Behavioral analysis catches everything else. Our detection engine combines signature-based rules, ML anomaly detection, and threat intelligence for comprehensive coverage.

step3.title: Smart Prioritization
step3.description: Not all alerts deserve attention. Vinci Logic scores every detection based on asset criticality, threat context, and kill chain progression—so you always know where to look first.

step4.title: Guided Investigation
step4.description: When human judgment is required, we make it fast. Pre-correlated evidence, timeline views, and AI-assisted analysis reduce investigation time from hours to minutes.

step5.title: Orchestrated Response
step5.description: Close the loop. Trigger automated containment, enrich cases with context, and maintain audit trails—all from a single pane of glass.
